sentence: What is that tugging I feel!
Hey, you! Stop! You down there!
Oh my, oh my, is this real?
A little mouse just appeared out of thin air!
Who are you?
Apologies!
My name is Mousy - I’m not from this town
I’m lost, you see, and I am feeling quite down
I miss my parents, my siblings, and my friends
Anyway, sorry for pulling on your rear end.
My rear-end! Hmph!
I can see that you’re upset, so I’ll let that slide
If you’re lost, maybe I can be your guide?
Huh? You-you mean you would do that for me?
Hooray! Hooray! I would be so happy!
Bless you, dear Mister, and bless your family too
Just one thing I have to ask, who are you?
My name is Sir Bitsy, I live here on the wall
I’ve seen many things, and I know it all
I know that you mice like those blocks made of milk,
I can see that sitting here from my web made of silk
Look around, Mousy, what do you see?
All I see are bricks - are we inside a wall?
Yes, but look again, is there nothing else at all?
Blocks of cheese! Oh, I can’t believe my eyes.
Why are they here? What a wonderful surprise.
They were left by mice who came before you
Yes, dear Mousy, they never made it through
Be very very careful, and pay attention to me
What I’m about to say might just set you free
To get out of here is simply confusing
It’ll be a challenge for sure, and not at all amusing
But the good thing is that you can walk, jump, and climb
Hop right on those bricks, and don’t waste your time
There are bricks that are low, there are bricks that are high
They’re out of reach - don’t you wish you could fly?
But don’t fret, just look for blocks of cheddar cheese,
Stack them on one another, now climb up with ease!
Try that, Mousy!
These grimy critters! Are you all right, dear Mousy?
Of course not. You just ran right into a Dust Bunny!
These guys and gals don’t mean to offend you at all,
But they will sure make you cough, and eventually fall
Mousy, good job! You’re a pretty tough fella.
What we have here is some fresh mozzarella!
Eat these, and you will soon feel as good as new
If I weren’t a spider, I’d sure eat some too!
Oh wow! Look, Mousy. It’s a nice block of Swiss
To run through Dust Bunnies, all you will need is this
They won’t make you cough, when you’re so big and strong
You’ll run them right over, but not all day long!
Three seconds, Mousy, that’s all it will give you
But three seconds is all you’ll need to get through
